message:
Hey there! I'm ACE, your friendly academic AI assistant. I’m here to help you with pretty much anything related to your studies – from understanding tricky concepts to creating flashcards or even quizzing yourself. 

Basically, I can be your go-to for all things academic. 

To start, could you tell me a little bit about yourself? What’s your name, and what are you currently studying or working on? Don’t worry about being too formal - just a quick introduction is fine! 😊
Okay, no problem! It sounds like you’re wrapping things up. Just wanted to check in and see if there’s anything else I can help you with before you go. 😊
